#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

ll powN(ll num,int n)
{
	if(n == 0)
		return 1;
	else if(n == 1)
		return num;
	ll temp = powN(num,n/2);
	if(n&1)
		return num*temp*temp;
	else
		return temp*temp;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll t, n;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n == 0 || n == 1)
			printf("%lld\n",n);
	else
		printf("%lld\n",powN(2*n - 1, 2) + (n-1));
	}
	return 0;
}
